s: Everybody seems to buy the Flysky FS-i6 for the 1 pound battle bot competitions. It's the go-to transmitter because it just works. I researched quite a bit, because there appears to be many manufacturers who use the Flysky name. I purchased this one because the brand is listed as FlySky.

t: Amazon.com: FlySky 2.4GHz 6 Channel Digital Transmitter and Receiver Radio System : Toys & Games
s: I bought this receiver and transmitter to try and to compare with the higher brands because I have it's little brother the flysky FS-I6. It looked cheap but it worked great in a rtf eachine falcon 250. As soon as I got it in the mail I started a quadcopter build.
